allCats.name: Fluffy Knight
allCats.desc: This is a gray cutie with an adorable baseball hat.

reviews.text: This is the best cat ever. Yay!

allCats.name: Good Rainbow
allCats.desc: All the colors of the rainbow in cat form.

reviews.text: He's a good lookin' rainbow. I'm definitely giving him 5 stars!

allCats.name: Bumbly Meow
allCats.desc: This is a gray kitty, slighly chubby, and has a big tail.

reviews.text: This cat is very hungry and carries around a fishbone with it all the time.

allCats.name: Coy Pinky
allCats.desc: This is a pink cat and pretends he doesn't like you but he does...NOT

allCats.name: Crazy Pinky
allCats.desc: This is a pink cat and is very crazy. Don't leave him alone with your children.

reviews.text: I left him alone with my children.

allCats.name: Curmudgeonly Crumbcatcher
allCats.desc: This a cranky, pretentious kitty.  Only loves his mouse. Doesn't share.

reviews.text: I never have any crumbs thanks to this kitty!

allCats.name: Daddy Bob
allCats.desc: This snow white kitty has sired many kittens. Named Bob.

reviews.text: good kitty, but too many kittens!
Cat out all night! Angry female cats show up in the morning! DO. NOT. Trust.

allCats.name: Delightful Ploop
allCats.desc: The most delightful kitten, big tail.

allCats.name: Evil Meep
allCats.desc: PURE EVIL.

allCats.name: Formidable Twinkie
allCats.desc: Pure good.

reviews.text: Good kitty! Brings you pizza! Would pet again.

allCats.name: Night Cookie
allCats.desc: Very nocturnal. Secretly eats all the fish

allCats.name: Jiggly Casper
allCats.desc: AH! ITS A GHOST! HOWD YOU GET IN HERE! DONT HAUNT ME!

reviews.text: Best haunting ever. would get haunted again.

allCats.name: Space Hijinks
allCats.desc: This little guy likes to do cartwheels in outer space. who wouldnt?

reviews.text: I like a cat who has diverse interests, so this kitty is a 5

allCats.name: Magic Berry
allCats.desc: This cat is marked down to move! slightly used, but still has a lot of miles on him!

reviews.text: I had this cat before. Not flashy, but a good solid cat.

allCats.name: Loopy Rainbow
allCats.desc: This cat comes from a land of JUST rainbows, so he is very confused about regular human

reviews.text: I like this cat because he has unique perspectives on life, the universe, Everything!

allCats.name: Space Killer
allCats.desc: This intergalactic assassin is visiting our world in cat-form for a while.

reviews.text: I like this cat because he has unique perspectives on life, the universe, Everything!

allCats.name: Mighty Casper
allCats.desc: This brawny ghost kitty can beat up intruders!

reviews.text: This cat is too invisible. would not reccomend.

allCats.name: Sir Bailey
allCats.desc: This kitty is happy to lounge all day and watch the beautiful game on tv.

reviews.text: I would get along with this cat. we could watch the footy!

allCats.name: Pumpernickel
allCats.desc: Is cat. Is awesome. Is cute. Yes.

allCats.name: Space Smooch
allCats.desc: The best, most spacey cat in the outer space.

allCats.name: Petty Pigeon
allCats.desc: This is a standard meowing cat. not reliable. but that's standard for cats.

allCats.name: Sparkly Pinky
allCats.desc: this cat has no cat-agory in our system to define its very unique qualities. but you can see them for yourself: PINKNESS!

allCats.name: Night Knight
allCats.desc: This kitty is veerrrrryyy sleeeepy. thats why he's called night night. Cause he's always sleepin!

allCats.name: Tricksy Berry
allCats.desc: Contrarian to a fault. Fan of green yarn. Loves eating buffalo chicken wraps.
